holidays.title: National Scrabble Day
holidays.description: It's time to C-E-L-E-B-R-A-T-E one of the world's most iconic board games.

holidays.title: FND Awareness Day
holidays.description: Together we can unravel the mystery of FND through awareness, support, and research!

holidays.title: International Plant Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Let's plant our way to a greener, safer planet while appreciating these green oxygen makers.

holidays.title: International Special Librarians Day
holidays.description: Let us rejoice in the fact that information professionals exist in today's workplace!

holidays.title: National Borinqueneers Day
holidays.description: Let’s pay tribute to the Borinqueneers  — a depiction of Puerto Rican pride and fighting spirit.

holidays.title: National Peach Cobbler Day
holidays.description: From classics like peach- and blackberry cobblers, to crisps, crumbles, Brown Betties, and pandowdies!

holidays.title: National Silly Earring Day
holidays.description: The best accessory today is an earring, which makes everyone around you smile.

holidays.title: National Theresa Day
holidays.description: Theresa is a lovely name with deep roots steeped in culture and meaning.

holidays.title: Orthodox Easter Monday
holidays.description: It's another day to rejoice, celebrate the resurrection of Christ, and find some Easter eggs.

holidays.title: Songkran Water Festival
holidays.description: Prepare your water guns, hoses, and buckets as we celebrate the world’s wettest festival!

holidays.title: Thomas Jefferson Day
holidays.description: Get to know Thomas Jefferson, the third president of the United States.

holidays.title: Unfairly Prosecuted Persons Day
holidays.description: Let's take a look at the history, key dates, and facts surrounding Unfairly Prosecuted Persons Day.

holidays.title: Yom HaShoah
holidays.description: Yom HaShoah brings with it garlands of determination and strength amidst tales of suffering.

holidays.title: Maya Summers’s Birthday
holidays.description: Summers is a persistent woman who aims to be the queen of YouTube.

holidays.title: Thomas Jefferson’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is remembered for being honest and good-hearted and for his social and political achievements
